values:
Here's my first draft of your layout. I decided on an S2 layout since it is more functional and all the text (like sidebox, profile, etc) can be done in the wizard, so you can change things without having to wait for me to help you. It's gives you more control!

All views are coded (entries, flist, archive, day) -but this is for a free account, so no comment pages.

The only issue I've noticed so far is that the 'bullets' sometimes get put to the left side, but it doesn't hurt the text of the bullets -and really, how often are you using bullets in your entries anyway?

So tell me if you want anything changed, and then after that we can talk about how to get this up for you.
-HN

PS: As this is my first S2 layout, I might show it off a bit to a few others.

I'm still working on this. Made some changes to make it more cross browser compatible (800*600+), but I'm gonna have to stop for a bit. I had to edit the background from fixed to scroll, which nessitated changing the background from the table from the page background to coding into the table. I will do the same for the sidebar so it won't have gaps in its pink borders. Gonna make something to put in a div just below the navigation/above the entries table to cover up the default navigation bit. I'll also fix that read link (not showing up). Lemme know if you have any ideas/requests.

Rules 1. I write deliciously depraved snarky smut NC17 fanfiction. I'll assume anyone asking me to friend them is is also depraved at least 17, and it's legal to read such stuff where you reside. And yes, I will check your age on your LJ. If it's not there, you won't be added. 2. This isn't my layout journal, so please don't request a layout here. I only do layouts for friends and I only offer layout advice on communities like , not my personal journals. 3. You don't expect me to comment in your journal or read your entries. This is only my fanfiction posting journal. I filter my friends page here to just communities, and I rarely read the rest of my flist. I have a more personal journal for my day-to-day readings. Okay, click the banner (coming soon) to visit my user info, where detailed rules await ^_^ You have to comment with a phrase that proves you've read the rules, so make sure you do!

okay, so now I will show you how to use a LJ cut when you have a lot of text in your journal.

<lj-cut text="click here and you can see the rest of what I wrote">

New Stories

1. Blonde Bear and Two Sweet Girls By Tista
This story happens after Smashed in season 6 and before As You Were. Harmony meets Buffy in the cemetery and confronts her about her relationship with Spike. 

2. Breakfast In Bed By Tista
Buffy rescued Spike from the First. She wants to take care of him, and the first thing she does is serves him breakfast in bed. This is a fluffy story about a vampire bite. 

3. Demon Beauty: Blondes By Tista
This is a stand alone that takes place after the Harsh Light of Day. It was going to be the start of a series, but the rest of it didn't develop like I planned. I always wondered how Spike got his hair bleached and came up with an idea for a demonic beau 

4. Getting Lucky By Tista
A St. Patrick's Day fic. Spike turns Angelus in to a Leprechaun in this 2nd season fic. Drusilla and Angelus get it on before and after the Leprechaun change, but the real heart of the story is very Spuffy. 

5. Halloween Treats By Tista
Halloween Treats is a hot and playful NC-17 story set in the 5th Season of Buffy. I wanted to write a Halloween story in a season with no Halloween episode. The Scoobies have a Halloween party and a certain vampire insures that Buffy has a good time. 

6. He Knew By Tista
Buffy runs into Spike at the Bronze shortly after Faith took over her body. They have a conversation and it gets so hot they finish it up at his crypt. Just another excuse for them to get it on. 

7. Just A Peek By Tista
A alternative ending to Bewitched, Bothered and Bewildered in Season 2. Buffy is naked in the school basement and Spike shows up. The first Valentine's Day the couple spends together. 

8. Mistletoe By Tista
My Christmas story. I watched the holiday flashback in The Body and wanted to add some romantic Spuffy goodness to it. Takes place after Into the Woods. I use some dialogue and ideas from the Christmas flashback in The Body. 


More tomarrow *points up to question in title* 


</lj-cut>

Now that stops us from annoying anyone who is reading the community by accident.  Sometimes people just get weird about this kind of thing.  didn't want you to get flames.  bleh!
